data.text: Things we were disappointed with were the evensing entertainment which did not meet the standard of other hotels we have stayed at. We were a part of a group of 11 and there was not one day where 1or more of us were not ill with vomitting or diarrhoea. We took every precaution but to no avail.Towell attendant at the heated family pool was rude to my wife. The Indian restaurant was a shambles both with service and food quality. There did not seem to be enough loungers to parasols on the beach although the attendant worked really hard to try to find us enough.On the positive side the buffet had a good selection and the other a la cartes were good.esoecially the Asian, Mexican and Mongolian. The grounds were beautiful and the hotel itself well maintained. The environmental awareness was good but fresh drinking water fountains would cut plastic bottle waste hugely.Raising wareness of food wastage by showing figures is a great idea.The majority of the staff were very polite,friendly and helpful. Mention to Mohammed in main buffet
data.title: Great holiday but a few issues

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Sincerely,

Kind regards,
_______________

Holiday Concierge Team 

SENTIDO Mamlouk Palace Resort (managed by SUNRISE Resorts& Cruises)
owner_response.author: Mamlouk Palace

data.text: Amazing hotel , very kind and helpful staff all food very delicious, also big benefit of using sister hotel pools and water slides ,  privite beach,  all restaurants with amazing food menu  only required book day before , overall grate hotel recommend everyone  .
data.title: Amazing holiday experience.

data.text:
Let's start with the room
It's fit for purpose we always ask for the same Block 27 these rooms haven't been renovated as yet but there is a full refurbishment going on, one block at a time 
The staff I can't speak highly enough of them so friendly and polite 
If you want something, they couldn't be more helpful if it can be done it will be.

FOOD 
oh my, it's excellent 
Let's start breakfast in the main dining room a massive selection 
And great to see your food been cooked in front of you 

La Terazza (Spanish restaurant)
Led by Alaa the perfect host the food here is excellent 
Prepared by Chef

Manzoku (Asian restaurant)
Led by Moustafa and another top-class host
The food prepared by the legend Chefe Samir

Manohar (Indian restaurant)
Led by Mostafa another top-class host
The food prepared by Chefe Dodo 
Always with a smile

Frida (Mexican restaurant)
Led by Mohamed yet another fabulous host 

Basilco (Italian restaurant)
The food here is excellent 
Never be afraid to ask for non menu items 

All the above are brilliant, Ala Carte restaurant's the food is stunning and the staff couldn't be more helpful 

The room cleaner Mohamed was brilliant with his cleaning, nothing was ever to much and his towel designs

This is a perfect hotel for the price 
I could talk so much more.
But please visit and make your own memories you won't be disappointed 

Heated, and cold pools
Entertainment is good too
data.title: Superb hotel, fabulous food, great staff what more do you need ?

data.text:
8th Stay we never think of going elsewhere in Hurghada.  A few little changes every year which are a positive outcome. 

My only negative comment is that on the Beach people have been allowed to reserve beds (EARLY AS 6.00am) with items other than a towel e.g bucket,  hat, plastic bag,  bottle of water, snorkel, scarf. in my observation these people DO NOT TURN UP til after 10.00am.  When genuine people are looking for a bed. I do honestly think Management should put something into practice. 

Restaurants you cannot go wrong with either food or service.  No paper menu anymore, make sure you have your phone for QR CODE to access menu.

 We stayed in Block 28, had excellent cleaning from Mansour. 

Only bug bare was key card not working 8 times out of 14 had to go to Reception, apparently faulty wiring in the electronic door.

See you next time Mamlouk.
data.title: 8th Visit
